abstract.p: Georgana M Foster letter on July 2 travel article on architecture of Iowa barns recalls annual barn tours held in Elgin (S)

block.p: To the Editor: The fascination in the architecture of Iowa barns (''Barns of Johnson County,'' July 2) reminded me that annual barn tours are held in my hometown, Elgin, Iowa, by farmers and the local historical society members, who research the history and unique features of barns on working farms. The tour this year will be on Sept. 2; information is available from (800) 798-4447.

This preservation of agricultural heritage is encouraged by the statewide project in Iowa called the Silos and Smokestacks National Heritage Area. For more information on area tours, write Silos and Smokestacks, Box 2845, Waterloo, Iowa 50703, or see www.silosandsmokestacks.org.
